channel.title: Work with Math on Markdown Presentations for Developers
channel.description: Recent content in Work with Math on Markdown Presentations for Developers

item.title: MathJax Formulas
item.description: Add beautifully rendered math formulas to any slideshow presentation using the following: MathJax Support or LaTeX + AsciiMath Widget This guide documents MathJax Support via the MathJax plugin. MathJax is a JavaScript display engine for mathematics with support for LaTeX, MathML and other equation markup. By default, this plugin is disabled. To enable this plugin for your presentation, see MathJax plugin activation . Learn By Example Learn By Example within Snap Layouts MathJax Plugin Activation MathJax Backticks Syntax LaTeX + AsciiMath Widget Learn By Example This PITCHME.

item.title: LaTeX + AsciiMath Widget
item.description: Activate a GitPitch Paid Plan to unlock LaTeX + AsciiMath Widget support. UML Widget for LaTeX + AsciiMath Learn By Example - LaTeX Math Learn By Example - Ascii Math UML Widget for LaTeX + AsciiMath The UML Widget provides some excellent extensions for rendering math formulas on any slide. The same conventions, caching policies, and @uml widget syntax apply. This support is provided as an lightweight alternative to using MathJax Formulas .
